Class PaKActor

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGActorCollisionListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGBorderListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGKeyRepeatListener, ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGTileCollisionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class PaKActor
extends ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor
implements ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGKeyRepeatListener

The PaKman Actor. It is a keyboard listener and can be directed using the arrow keys.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Called in the game loop. Updates pakman's location and cycles the sprite.

Overrides:
act in class ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor

keyRepeated

public void keyRepeated(int keyCode)
Called when a key is pressed. This event handler consumes arrow keys and sets the direction of this PaKman according to the key pressed.

Specified by:
keyRepeated in interface ch.aplu.jgamegrid.GGKeyRepeatListener
Parameters:
keyCode - code of the pressed key (java.awt.event.KeyEvent)
